channel.title: Axe's go to helm slot, need help fixing please!
channel.description: I cant seem to get the axe do right, i mean it weilds in helm slot n shows it weilded as a weapon, but my current weapon (whip) double weilds with it, and wen i weild the axe my helm gets taken off...i spent 10 hours on this bitch n cant seem to figure it out...please help.

item.title: Axe's go to helm slot, need help fixing please!
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

[quote=“infinitymagic, post:2, topic:443751”]This are the slot ids:

Hats: targetSlot=0;
Capes: targetSlot=1;
Amulets: targetSlot=2;
Weapons: targetSlot = 3;
Bodys: targetSlot=4;
Shields: targetSlot=5;
Legs: targetSlot=7;
Gloves: targetSlot=9;
Boots: targetSlot=10;
Rings: targetSlot=12;
Arrows: targetSlot=13;[/quote]
If he’s using Project insanity , there’s a way to force the item to the right slot.

Read full topic
item.source: Axe's go to helm slot, need help fixing please!
